title: Operation Officer
job_description:
1. Main services of the project:
● Company formation services in Vietnam and abroad.
● Bank account set up
● Visa, Work permit. Temporary Residence Card ( TRC ) for Foreigner in Viet Nam
● Other related services support clients during doing the main services. ( Sub- license, Virtual office services... )
2. The nature of the project's work, needs the candidate's flexibility, dynamism, and quick adaptation:
● Consulting on Visa, WP, TRC services and other support services for customers from website, page, forum, forum..., promoting services, close deals.
● Follow up on paperwork procedures to complete the service between customers and the procedure team.
● Support, answer questions, before, during and after completing the service, Payment tracking.
● Coordinate with Pro- Active team to follow up on Company formation services procedures to complete the task of establishing a business for customers.
● Continue to establish processes and services with Leader to ensure an Excellent experience for customers
● Support team in exhibition and communication activities (if any)
requirements:
G2B welcomes and young people who meet the following criteria in order of priority:
- Ready to take on tasks, listen, cultivate and develop yourself.
-Discipline, honesty.
- Good communication, reading and writing skills in English.
- Agility, flexibility and responsibility.
- Proficiency in office computers.
- Preference will be given to candidates in the field of business, foreign trade.
-Prerequisites.
